text: Intoxicated is a single by American rock band Hinder from their album When the Smoke Clears. It was released on May 3, 2015 on The End Records. The Song debuted on the Active Rock Charts #38. Category:2015 songs Category:Hinder songs Category:Songs written by Marshall Dutton Category:Songs written by Cody Hanson
title: Intoxicated (Hinder song)
